property.name: displayCtrlSql
property.value: SELECT * FROM PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL A WHERE A.FUN_ID =? ORDER BY POS_X,POS_Y

property.name: eventCtrlSql
property.value: SELECT PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL.CTRL_ID,PUB_EVENT.EVENT_ID,PUB_EVENT.EVENT_TYPE,PUB_EVENT.FUN_ID,PUB_EVENT.JAVACLASS, PUB_EVENT.JAVA_BEAN,PUB_EVENT.METHOD,PUB_EVENT.JAVASCRIPT,PUB_EVENT.DISPLAYTYPE,PUB_EVENT.PAGE_ID, PUB_EVENT.PERFORMTYPE FROM PUB_EVENT,PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL WHERE PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL.FUN_ID=? AND PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL.CTRL_ID = PUB_EVENT.CTRL_ID

property.name: constraintSql
property.value: SELECT PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL.CTRL_ID,PUB_CONSTRAINT.CONST_ID,PUB_CONSTRAINT.CONST_TYPE,PUB_CONSTRAINT.CONST_NAME, PUB_CONSTRAINT.JAVACLASS,PUB_CONSTRAINT.JAVABEAN,PUB_CONSTRAINT.METHOD,PUB_CONSTRAINT.CONST_DESC FROM PUB_CONSTRAINT,PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL,PUB_CTRL_CONSTRAINT_RELA WHERE PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL.FUN_ID=? AND PUB_DISPLAY_CTRL.CTRL_ID = PUB_CTRL_CONSTRAINT_RELA.CTRL_ID AND PUB_CONSTRAINT.CONST_ID = PUB_CTRL_CONSTRAINT_RELA.CONST_ID
